metadata.title: Jenniarner Flannel Plush Novelty Throw Blanket, Depeche Electronic Music Mode Throw for Fall Sofa Decorative, Super Cozy and Thick Wrinkle-Resistant 50"x40"
features: Cozy & Durable: This throw blanket is made of flannel fleece polyester fiber that is super soft. Which is super soft, durable and warm, and lightweight yet durable enough to provide you with long term use.
More Sizes: Available in three sizes choose (L x W) - 50x40 inch, 60x50 inch, 80x60 inch. Suitable for Kids and Adult, Boys and Girls, Men and Women; Moms and Dads.

Design Concept: This throw blanket will let you feel less press when covering it. soft blanket is anti-pilling, wrinkle-free hypoallergenic, and does not shed. Great for those prone to allergies and asthma and easy to care, and is suitable for all seasons.

Multipurpose Use: Luxury warm flannel fleece blankets are ideal for indoor and outdoor use the material is so soft and smooth then also thick, and feel really warm when you put in on. Feels like a silky blanket tho, perfect for snuggling up on the couch, bed, theater, park.Especially when camping outdoors or on a picnic.

Great Gift Idea: Make loved ones smile! Searching for a perfect and thoughtful gift? Look no further. The throw blanket is a perfect gift for any occasion! Valentine's Day, Father's Day, Mother's Day, Christmas, Baby Shower, Wedding Shower, or simply a beautiful housewarming gift. This blanket will make a wonderful addition to any home or room.
description: specializes in the design and manufacturing of home textiles and decor.
Great to use on your bed, couch, living room, or anywhere else.
Anti static, Anti-pill, No wrinkles, Anti-fading, No shedding or shrinkage, No odor to keep its shape over time.
This premium flannel throw blanket is warm and cozy, making it the ideal choice for all season use. Its lightweight makes it easy to store and carry with, perfect for traveling and backpacking.
For easy home care, simply machine wash low and hang dry.
For hassle-free shopping experience with this polar fleece heated blanket. For any quality-related issues, feel free to contact us.
